rows.label: qev030301_MSG0001
rows.name:
Mmm? You are not Cavern Clan.
...Oll? Brother? Is that you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030301_JNK0010
rows.name: Joke

rows.label: qev030301_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Rada that you are Oll, all right!

rows.label: qev030301_JNK0020
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev030301_SEL0021
rows.name: Say no, but explain that you are here to help.

rows.label: qev030301_MSG0002
rows.name:
No. That is not Oll's voice. Are you clown?
Do you try to amuse me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030301_MSG0003
rows.name:
Are you here to rescue me? I have been through much.
Starvation. Torture. Your jokes are not welcome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030301_MSG0004
rows.name:
I knew Tree Clan would come.
We do not abandon our own.
We are not cruel like Cavern scum![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030301_MSG0005
rows.name:
Fear kept me alert. Now fear is gone.
Only exhaustion exists. I will accept your help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030301_MSG0006
rows.name:
This cell's key is held by Cavern clansman called Mujiba
Falgo. Deal with him and take key.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030301_MSG0007
rows.name:
This place is dark. It smells bad.
I want to leave soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030301_MSG0008
rows.name:
This cell's key is held by Cavern clansman called Mujiba
Falgo. Deal with him and take key.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030301_MSG0009
rows.name: Yes! I am free![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030301_MSG0010
rows.name:
Now we must find Oll. My brother.
Then we can leave this place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030301_MSG0011
rows.name: He is in this same hold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030301_MSG0012
rows.name:
I cannot leave without him.
You must help him as you helped me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030301_MSG0013
rows.name: ...You already rescued my brother?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030301_MSG0014
rows.name: You are hero! Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030301_MSG0015
rows.name:
I will hurry back. I will see Oll.
He will know I did not break in captivity.
No weeping. No crying. Only pride of Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030301_MSG0016
rows.name:
You will do it? Good. You are strong.
You can keep him safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030301_MSG0017
rows.name: You are brave. My brother's life is yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030301_MSG0018
rows.name:
Be careful. Cavern clan has trained simius.
They fight for them. They are dangerous.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030301_MSG0019
rows.name:
Simius hate kepha holly. You should carry some.
It will serve you well.[ST:wait ]
